short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyboard shortcuts to make ChatGPT quicker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Lightspeed Keyboard is a Chrome extension that offers efficient keyboard shortcuts for interacting with ChatGPT:
- Interrupt Output: Ctrl + Shift + K (Cmd + Shift + K for Mac)
- Switch to GPT-4: Alt + 4 (Option + 4 for Mac)
- Switch to GPT-3.5: Alt + 3 (Option + 3 for Mac)
- Switch to GPT-4 with Plugins: Ctrl + Shift + P (Cmd + Shift + P for Mac)
